result.markdown:
::: {.question} **Ownership After Two Funding Rounds** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(404) #| eval: true #| echo: false #| results: asis #| warning: false # Dados aleatórios founders_pct_after_A <- round(runif(1, 0.60, 0.75), 3) seriesA_pct <- 1 - founders_pct_after_A seriesB_investment <- round(runif(1, 4, 6), 3) seriesB_ownership <- round(runif(1, 0.20, 0.30), 3) final_founders_pct <- round((1 - seriesB_ownership) * founders_pct_after_A, 3) seriesA_pct_final <- round((1 - seriesB_ownership) * seriesA_pct, 3) ``` ::: After a Series A round, the founders owned **71.7%** of BetaVision. Then, Series B investors contributed **5.107 million** and received **25.2%** of the company. ::: {.question-block}
1. What is the founders’ final ownership (%)?
✅ Founders’ final ownership = (1 - 25.2%) × 71.7% = **53.6%**
::: ::: {.question-block}
✅ Series A ownership = (1 - 25.2%) × 28.3% = **21.2%**
::: :::
